K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-028:471b-1: aom b'a kye te dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-028:471b-2: aom b'a kye sha she sv'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-028:471b-3: aom b'a kye kha na dza ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-028:471b-4: aom b'a kye ni shtha aa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-028:471b-5: aom b'a kye ya na ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-028:471b-6: aom b'a kye dam na ma: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan 'di nyid lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-028:471b-7: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan rdzogs so //
